note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [dm].[Fct_YH_Store_Flag_Daily] fl JOIN dm.Dim_Store ds ON fl.Store_ID = ds.Store_ID WHERE ds.SR_Level_1='张兴华' AND fl.Date_ID=CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE()-1,112) AND fl.SKU_Distribution in ('库存不足','库存为0门店','库存滞销')
note.title: [Alert] YH门店库存预警
note.body: #### 发现当前有库存不足YH门店，或有滞销门店，请及时查看！ @张兴华 ![screenshot](https://cdn-a.william-reed.com/var/wrbm_gb_food_pharma/storage/images/7/4/7/6/3266747-1-eng-GB/Food-Union-buys-Premia-Foods-ice-cream-business-for-27m_wrbm_large.jpg) [查看YH门店库存陈列](https://app.powerbi.com/view?r=eyJrIjoiOWEzNmJlMjMtODgxYi00ODE4LWI4NjktOGU2MmQwOGI2OTk0IiwidCI6IjI3ODEyMTk1LTg3YWItNGI1ZS05YmU2LTBiOWZmNTYwNWYzZiIsImMiOjh9)
